20101228070138.000|20101228070139.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT RAINED FOR A    
20101228070139.000|20101228070139.000|CC1|WEEK STRAIGHT LEADING TO        
20101228070139.000|20101228070140.000|CC1|MUDSLIDES THAT SWALLOWED CARS

20101228070140.000|20101228070141.000|CC1|11 CALIFORNIA COUNTIES WERE     
20101228070141.000|20101228070142.000|CC1|UNDER STATES OF EMERGENCY.      
20101228070142.000|20101228070142.000|CC1|AS THE STORM SYSTEM MOVED       
20101228070142.000|20101228070143.000|CC1|EASTWARD IT BURIED PARTS OF THE 
20101228070143.000|20101228070145.000|CC1|ROCKIES WITH UP TO NINE FEET OF 
20101228070145.000|20101228070145.000|CC1|SNOW, AND THERE WAS TALK OF SOME

20101228070617.000|20101228070618.000|CC1|TRYING TO DIG OUT FROM THE FOUR

20101228070746.000|20101228070747.000|CC1|CRIME IN OUR AREA.

20101228070751.000|20101228070755.000|CC1|SO FAR THIS YEAR 291 MURDERS

20101228071913.000|20101228071914.000|CC1|PHONE AND CABLE COMPANIES TO    
20101228071914.000|20101228071916.000|CC1|CHARGE YOU TO PAY BY PHONE OR   
20101228071916.000|20101228071918.000|CC1|ONLINE.                         
20101228071918.000|20101228071920.000|CC1|HOWEVER, WHEN IT COMES TO CREDIT
20101228071920.000|20101228071922.000|CC1|CARD COMPANIES, IT'S ILLEGAL TO 
20101228071922.000|20101228071924.000|CC1|CHARGE A FEE FOR PAYING UNLESS

20101228071944.000|20101228071947.000|CC1|ONE TOLD US: "ANYTIME YOU MAKE A
20101228071947.000|20101228071948.000|CC1|PAYMENT WITH A REPRESENTATIVE,

20101228071952.000|20101228071954.000|CC1|IT CAN ONLY CHARGE FOR LAST

20101228071956.000|20101228071957.000|CC1|DIDN'T WANT TO COMMENT ON THOSE 
20101228071957.000|20101228071958.000|CC1|PARTICULAR CASES, BUT SAYS THE  
20101228071958.000|20101228071959.000|CC1|FEE COVERS THE COST OF DOING    
20101228071959.000|20101228072002.000|CC1|BUSINESS.                       
20101228072002.000|20101228072003.000|CC1|>> THE FEES INTENDED TO HELP    
20101228072003.000|20101228072005.000|CC1|COVER THE COST OF THE WORKERS
